title: Flick Finder
description: A movie recommendation app, where a user can search for a movie by Title and/or Year of release to get related movies the user can watch. This was a team project where I contributed about 50% of the work in a team of 5.

title: Bootstrap Portfolio
description: A webpage showcasing my portfolio of web apps using Bootstrap. You can find links to live deployments as well as my GitHub dashboard. I have taken a mobile-first, responsive design approach which was made easy by Bootstrap.

title: Calculator
description: A calculator app built using HTML, CSS and Javascript. It is capable of carrying out all basic arithmetic operations.

title: Employee Info App
description: An app lets you input your employees' information and generates a HTML file that dispalys your employees' information. Every employee's info is displayed in a nicely formatted card with an icon representing the role of the employee.

title: Etch a Sketch
description: Etch-a-Sketch app, a mechanical drawing toy, built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather app that gives you weather conditions for the current time and for the following 5 days. The information included is temperature, wind speed, humidity, and weather condition (displayed with an icon).
